column1: '''''Mythlore'' 36''' (Volume 10, Issue 2) is an issue of the [[Mythlore]] journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
*"The Many Faces of Heroism in Tolkien"
*"Yeats, Joyce and Tolkien, the Artist as Magician"
*"The Nature of Dreams in Lord of the Rings"
*"The Great Divorce and the Medieval Dream Vision"
